___PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the identity certificate as the account credential

___RemoteAddress.description: IP address or hostname of the VPN server

___UseConfigurationAttributeInternalIPSu.description: Set to 1 to indicate if negotiation should use IKEv2 Configuration Attribute INTERNAL_IP4_SUBNET and INTERNAL_IP6_SUBNET.

___EnableCertificateRevocationCheck.description: Optional. Set to 1 to enable a certificate revocation check for IKEv2 connections. This is a best-effort revocation check; server response timeouts will not cause it to fail.

___ServerAddresses.description: An array of DNS server IP address strings (IPv4 or IPv6)

___ServerCertificateCommonName.description: Common name of the server certificate

___SupplementalMatchDomainsNoSearch.description: Optional. Whether (0) or not (1) the domains in the SupplementalMatchDomains list should be appended to the resolver’s list of search domains. Default is 0.

___SearchDomains.description: A list of domain strings used to fully qualify single-label host names.

___SupplementalMatchDomains.description: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in ServerAddresses.

___DisableMOBIKE.description: Set to 1 to disable MOBIKE negotiation in IKEv2

___DomainName.description: The primary domain of the tunnel

___CertificateType.description: Type of the certificate; defaults to RSA

___EnablePFS.description: Set to 1 to enable Perfect Forward Secrecy for IKEv2 connections

___ExtendedAuthEnabled.description: Set to 1 to enable extended authentication (EAP)

___NATKeepAliveOffloadEnable.description: Set to 1 to enable or 0 to disable NAT Keepalive offload for Always On VPN IKEv2 connections

___RemoteIdentifier.description: Remote Identifier of the IKEv2 client

___ServerCertificateIssuerCommonName.description: Common Name of the server certificate issuer

___NATKeepAliveInterval.description: NAT Keepalive interval for Always On VPN IKEv2 connections

___DisableRedirect.description: Set to 1 to disable IKEv2 redirect

___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___VPNSubType.description: If VPNType is "VPN" this field will be an identifier for a vendor specified configuration dictionary

___VPNType.description: Determines the settings available for this VPN payload

___OverridePrimary.description: If set, all network traffic is sent over the VPN interface

___PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate to use for account credentials

___RemoteAddress.description: IP address or hostname of the VPN server

___AuthenticationMethod.description: Authentication method. Either shared secret or certificate

___PromptForVPNPIN.description: If set, user will be prompted for a PIN when connecting

___XAuthEnabled.description: 1 if XAUTH is ON, 0 if XAUTH is OFF

___LocalIdentifierType.description: Present only if AuthenticationMethod = SharedSecret. Must be "KeyID"

___OnDemandRules.description: An array of dictionaries defining On Demand Rules

items.description: A DNS address. May include wildcards

___DNSServerAddressMatch.description: An array of DNS Server Addresses

items.description: A DNS server address. May include wildcards

___XAuthPasswordEncryption.description: String value is either "Prompt" or not present

___LocalIdentifier.description: The name of the group to use. If Hybrid Authentication is used, the string must end with "[hybrid]"

___SharedSecret.description: The shared secret for this VPN account

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

___Group.description: Group to connect to on the head end. Valid only for Cisco AnyConnect

___Role.description: Role to select when connecting to the server. Valid only for Juniper SSL

___Realm.description: Realm to connect to on the server

___CCPEnabled.description: Enables encryption on the connection. If this key and CCPMPPE40Enabled are true, represents automatic encryption level; if this key and CCPMPPE128Enabled are true, represents maximum encryption level. If no encryption is used, then none of the CCP keys are true.

___CCPMPPE128Enabled.description: Enables encryption on the connection. If this key and CCPEnabled are true, represents automatic encryption level

___CommRemoteAddress.description: IP address or hostname of VPN server

___AuthEAPPlugins.description: Only present if RSA SecurID is being used, in which case it has one string entry: EAP-RSA

items.description: String inside EAP Plugins array. If present, must be "EAP-RSA"

___CCPMPPE40Enabled.description: Enables encryption on the connection. If this key and CCPEnabled are true, represents maximum encryption level

___AuthProtocol.description: Only present if RSA SecurID is being used, in which case it has one string entry: EAP

items.description: String inside Auth Protocol array. If present, must be "EAP"

___TokenCard.description: Use a token card such as an RSA SecurID card for connecting

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the certificate to use for account credentials

___RemoteAddress.description: Hostname or IP address for server

___OnDemandRules.description: An array of dictionaries defining On Demand Rules

items.description: A DNS address. May include wildcards

___DNSServerAddressMatch.description: An array of DNS Server Addresses

items.description: A DNS server address. May include wildcards

___AuthenticationMethod.description: Authentication method. Either shared secret or certificate

___DisconnectOnIdleTimer.description: Length of time to wait before disconnecting an on demand connection

___DisconnectOnIdle.description: Disconnect after an on demand connection idles

___UserDefinedName.description: Description of the VPN connection displayed on the device

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___TunnelConfigurations.description: This array contains an arbitrary number of TunnelConfigurations

items.description: An item in theTunnelConfigurations array describing an individual configuration

___PayloadCertificateUUID.description: The UUID of the identity certificate as the account credential

___DeadPeerDetectionRate.description: Dead peer detection rate; defaults to Medium

___RemoteAddress.description: IP address or hostname of the VPN server

___UseConfigurationAttributeInternalIPSu.description: Set to 1 to indicate if negotiation should use IKEv2 Configuration Attribute INTERNAL_IP4_SUBNET and INTERNAL_IP6_SUBNET.

___EnableCertificateRevocationCheck.description: Set to 1 to enable certificate revocation check for IKEv2 connections

___EnablePFS.description: Set to 1 to enable Perfect Forward Secrecy for IKEv2 connections

___ExtendedAuthEnabled.description: Set to 1 to enable extended authentication (EAP)

___NATKeepAliveOffloadEnable.description: Set to 1 to enable NAT Keepalive offload for Always-on VPN IKEv2 connections

___RemoteIdentifier.description: Remote Identifier of the IKEv2 client

___ServerCertificateCommonName.description: Common Name of the server certificate

___ServerCertificateIssuerCommonName.description: Common Name of the server certificate issuer

___NATKeepAliveInterval.description: NAT Keepalive interval for Always-on VPN IKEv2 connections. This value controls the interval over which Keepalive offload packets are sent by the device. The minimum value is 20 seconds. If no key is specified, the default is 20 seconds over Wi-Fi and 110 seconds over Cellular interface.

___DisableMOBIKE.description: Set to 1 to disable MOBIKE negotiation in IKEv2

___DisableRedirect.description: Set to 1 to disable IKEv2 redirect
